comments.text:
Created attachment 570487
screenshot

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111019081014

Steps to reproduce:

Load the following page with Firefox 8 on OS X 10.7: http://jacobian.org/writing/

Previous versions of OS X and Firefox are impacted too, but I can’t remember exact numbers.


Actual results:

All the text is invisible (see the screenshot attached).


Expected results:

The text should be visible. It seems that Firefox overrides the default font, even if the @font-face is not properly loaded.
comments.raw_text:

comments.author: hi@bpier.re
comments.creator: hi@bpier.re

comments.raw_text: Tested on another OS X (10.6) with Firefox 8 it works. Seems to be related with my system configuration, but the font used by this website is not installed on my system.
